message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $110 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $115 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I'm willing to meet you at $118. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's a great value for the product.
